onboarding.title: Getting started
onboarding.subtitle: Unlock your member benefits in under two minutes.

1.description: Log in with your BI account to access memberships and digital cards.

2.title: Choose BISO in the menu
2.description: Open the side menu, select BISO and preview the benefits before you sign up.

3.title: Pick your payment option
3.description: Year or semester – choose what suits you. Vipps and cards are accepted.

4.title: Activate your benefits
4.description: Your digital membership card and discounts are available instantly.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Need something else? Reach out to your campus leadership or email contact@biso.no.

cost.question: What does membership cost?
cost.answer: Membership is NOK 450 for a full year. You can also choose a semester payment if you prefer flexibility.

discounts.question: How do I access the discounts?
discounts.answer: Everything lives inside the BI Student app. Activate your membership and you’ll find digital codes and tickets right away.

switchCampus.question: Can I switch campus after joining?
switchCampus.answer: Yes. Your benefits are national. Change campus in the top menu or in the app to view local offers.

engagement.question: Do I need a position to get the benefits?
engagement.answer: No. The benefits are available whether or not you hold a role—but we encourage you to explore the opportunities!

ctaCard.title: Ready to join?
ctaCard.subtitle: Membership activates instantly. You can switch campus and unlock new benefits whenever you like.
